segments.text: So , did I tell you about my New Year ’ s resolution ? I ’ Ve decided to go on a diet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you ’ re going to completely transform your eating habits , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly ! I ’ m going to cut out all that junk I eat , no more chips , no more soda , no more fried food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve heard this one before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But this time I ’ m going to stick to it . I really mean it ! Trust me , Carol , I ’ m going to be a new man in one year ’ s time !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess we ’ ll just have to wait and see .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , honey , that was a great meal . I ’ m stuffed . Do we have any chips left ?
segments.speaker: S1
